properties.entry: Encryption Key must be in Hex format and 16 bytes long (32 hex values).
Encryption Key must be 16 bytes long (32 hex values).
Socket number must be 1025 when port type is not shared.
There must be max 2 point limit object.
Control offset field value must be 0 if Control type is NONE.
Control Inhibited field value must be false if Control type is NONE.
Archive Interval field value must be 0 if Archive Data type is NONE or On Change or On Update.
Limit Number valid values are 1 or 2.
Limit numbers must not be duplicate in limit objects.
